text: 9.9 Lo 25.4, 1 Ti 5.18 Takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak mɨgan ayaŋ, anɨgɨl tɨkɨl agak, Nɨbi chag bulmakaw poŋɨd apɨl, wit mɨdup tap okok taw chɨb jakek, mɨdup okok ke amɨl, cheg okok ke amɨl gaŋ agɨl, meg mɨgan nop ak ma tunɨg tɨbɨkɨnɨmɨb agɨl tɨkak. Wog gɨlɨg, ogɨnap ñɨŋɨnɨg ñɨŋɨnɨmuŋ agɨl tɨkak. Pen God chag bulmakaw okok gos nɨŋɨd takaw anɨb ak ma agak. Mel.
